text: The DBH Deutsche Buch Handels GmbH & Co. KG () based in Munich competes for being the major booktrading company in Germany with his rival Thalia. The DBH was established in 2006 as a Holding and belongs at 50% to the Hugendubel Beteiligungs GmbH & Co. KG () and the Verlagsgruppe Weltbild GmbH.http://www.buchmarkt.de/downloads/BM_EXTRA.pdf The DBH arose from the longtime cooperation between these two companies as a joint venture. Shareholders of the Verlagsgruppe Weltbild are 14 dioceses of the Roman Catholic Church in GermanyGesellschafter: Bistümer suchen Käufer für Weltbild - IT + Medien - Unternehmen - HandelsblattAugsburg: Kirche behält Weltbild - Nachrichten Augsburg - Augsburger Allgemeine and the Soldatenseelsorge Berlin (). The DBH stated a volume of 675 million Euro for the first accounting year (2006). The company manages about 465 branches of both of the proprietor companies with about 3500 employees (effective: 2006). In Germany, Austria and Switzerland there are the subsidiaries Hugendubel (34 branches), Weiland (33), Buch Habel (17), Schmorl und von Seefeld (2), Wohlthat'sche Buchhandlung (about 50), Weltbild/Weltbild Plus/Weltbild Best (about 260), Jokers Restseller (18), Weltbild! (12), A&M; and AM! (35).Buchhandlungen: DBH Buch Handels GmbH & Co. KG | Since July 2008, the DBH owns 44 of the 89 book departments of the Karstadt group. The remaining 45 departments were closed and the employees were moved to other departments. In Berlin and Potsdam, the local works council was able to delay and to arouse public interest supported by the trade union Ver.di.Stellenabbau bei der DBH: Wohlthat´sche: Entlassungen in Berlin | Sortiment | boersenblatt.netEin-Mann- Laden: Wohlthat’sche Buchhandlung spart Personal - Wirtschaft - Tagesspiegel Similar processes happened before at Buch Habel and Hugendubel.DBH: Hugendubel und Buch Habel: Stellenabbau verzögert sich | Sortiment | boersenblatt.net In November, 2009, the labour conflict started at Wohlthat.Streit um Wohlthat’sche eskaliert - buchreport - Nachrichten Handel In the end of 2009, the work councils in the DBH group established a Konzernbetriebsrat (i.e. a works council which is authorised to bargain local issues on trust level). This happened for expanding workers participation in the departments. The Konzernbetriebsrat is able to kick-start elections for works councils in those enterprises which have difficulties to manage this on their own. Besides this task, the local works councils (which have much more power than the Konzernbetriebsrat in their range but none beyond) shall get an efficient early warning system to be on notice of new plannings of the group management.Konzernbetriebsrat bei der DBH - buchreport - Nachrichten Handel The DBH uses the same ERP system in all of its dependents but didn't conduct centralised purchasing up to now. Other than the competitor Thalia, so far the single dependents keep their origin firm's names.
